alert.note: Alert for Butler; Cowley; Sedgwick; Sumner (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 20 at 2:11AM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Cowley, southeastern Sedgwick, southwestern Butler and northern Sumner Counties through 315 AM CDT... At 211 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Clearwater to 6 miles southeast of Conway Springs. Movement was east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Derby, Haysville, Wellington, Mulvane, Rose Hill, Douglass, Belle Plaine, Oxford, Udall, Rock, Mayfield, Riverdale and Wellington Airport. This includes Interstate 35 between Mile Markers 18 and 39. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 300 AM CDT for south central Kansas.
